name: An Unnamed Bullet Hell
description:
This game was made for the 2022 Bullet Hell Jam.

It is a standard first person shooter, with a few different types of enemies and a whole lot of bullets, as well as some undecorated powerups.

Controls are standard, WASD to move, space to jump, and mouse to look around/shoot.

I will note however that the direction of the barrel defines the direction of the bullet, not the center of the screen as usual. You can also jump unusually high especially when you health and vitality are high(your health is your health, vitality is how much health you gain when you are not being hit).

The main point of the game is to destroy as many of the enemy as possible.

Also, watch out for the skies ;).
